com.jdon.controller
类 WebAppUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.jdon.controller.WebAppUtil

public class WebAppUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Using WebAppUtil, framework's user can get his businesss service object that defined in jdonframework.xml this is main and important client class for framework's user.

static java.lang.Object getComponentInstance(java.lang.String name, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
          get a component that registered in container. the component is not different from the service. the component instance is single instance Any intercepter will be disable

          get a component that registered in container. the component is not different from the service. the component instance is single instance Any intercepter will be disable

          get this Web application's container

          get the key for the interceptor, by the key, use can add his interceptor to the container
static java.lang.Object getService(java.lang.String name, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
          get a service from jdonframework.xml's service configure. the service maybe is a pojo service or a ejb service.
static java.lang.Object getService(java.lang.String name, javax.servlet.ServletContext sc)
          Difference with getComponentInstance method: 1. this method return new service instance each times. 2. call methods of the return service instance, will active interceptors.

构造方法详细信息

WebAppUtil

public WebAppUtil()
方法详细信息

getService

public static java.lang.Object getService(java.lang.String name,
                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
get a service from jdonframework.xml's service configure. the service maybe is a pojo service or a ejb service.

if user has a business interface, so the interface can has two implemention:pojo or ejb, if is ejb, the ejb's local/remote interface must inherit the business interface. so the application's MVC will completely seperate from his business lay

usage: in jdonframework.xml:

UserDao ud = (UserDao)WebAppUtil.getService(userJdbcDao? request); UserDao is a interface.

参数：
name - String
request - HttpServletRequest
返回：
Object
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

getService

public static java.lang.Object getService(java.lang.String name,
                                          javax.servlet.ServletContext sc)
Difference with getComponentInstance method: 1. this method return new service instance each times. 2. call methods of the return service instance, will active interceptors. execept some interceptors about session, such as Stateful disable.

参数：
name -
sc -
返回：

getService

public static java.lang.Object getService(TargetMetaDef targetMetaDef,
                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

getComponentInstance

public static java.lang.Object getComponentInstance(java.lang.String name,
                                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
get a component that registered in container. the component is not different from the service. the component instance is single instance Any intercepter will be disable

getComponentInstance

public static java.lang.Object getComponentInstance(java.lang.String name,
                                                    javax.servlet.ServletContext sc)
get a component that registered in container. the component is not different from the service. the component instance is single instance Any intercepter will be disable

参数：
sc -
返回：

getEJBService

public static java.lang.Object getEJBService(java.lang.String name,
                                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
get a EJB service directly.

参数：
name - String
request - HttpServletRequest
返回：
Object
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

callService

public static java.lang.Object callService(java.lang.String serviceName,
                                           java.lang.String methodName,
                                           java.lang.Object[] methodParams,
                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
Command pattern for service invoke sample: browser url: /aaa.do?method=xxxxx xxxxx is the service's method, such as: public interface TestService{ void xxxxx(EventModel em); }

参数：
serviceName - the service name in jdonframework.xml
methodName - the method name
request -
model - the method parameter must be packed in a ModelIF object. if no method parameter, set it to null;
返回：
return the service dealing result
抛出：
java.lang.Exception
另请参见：
ServiceMethodAction

getContainerKey

public static java.lang.String getContainerKey()
get the key for the application container user can directly get his container from servletcontext by the key.

返回：
String

getInterceptorKey

public static java.lang.String getInterceptorKey()
get the key for the interceptor, by the key, use can add his interceptor to the container

返回：
String

getContainer

public static ContainerWrapper getContainer(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
get this Web application's container

参数：
request - HttpServletRequest
返回：
ContainerWrapper
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

getContainer

public static ContainerWrapper getContainer(javax.servlet.ServletContext sc)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
抛出：
java.lang.Exception
